1.5.name: wordpress/praized-community
1.5.description:
The Praized Community plugin allows you to deploys a complete local search section including 17M+ North American place listings, social tools and search functionalities through your WordPress blog (see screenshots).

You will need a Praized API key to use it.

This plugin is designed for use with the latest version of WordPress, but will work with versions 2.2 and newer. Our plugins also support WordPress MU 1.3+.

Please note that the Praized Community plugin requires PHP5.

See also: The companion Praized Tools plugin (PHP4 compatible).
